titles.title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on Benzoic acid, 4- [[ (2,5- dichlorophenyl) amino] carbonyl]-2-[[2-hydroxy-3- [[(2 -methoxyphenyl) amino] carbonyl] -1- naphthalenyl]-, methyl ester.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/11/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on benzoic acid, 4-(((2,5-dichlorophenyl) amino) carbonyl)-2-((2-hydroxy-3-(((2- methoxyphenyl) amino) carbonyl)-1-naphthalenyl)-, methyl ester.
